## Step 1
[Click here to create an account](https://sis2.cut.ac.cy/sap/bc/webdynpro/sap/zcut_wd_st_cr_account?sap-client=300&sap-language=EN#) and enter a valid e-mail address.

## Step 2
Follow the instructions you will receive on your personal e-mail to create your profile (personal information) in our system.  
Keep the access codes you will receive (username/password) to access the Portal.

## Step 3
From the web link [https://sis.cut.ac.cy/irj/portal](https://sis.cut.ac.cy/irj/portal) enter the username and password (as they were sent to your personal e-mail) in order to enter the Portal and to submit your application.

## Step 4
Select the *MSc Experiential and Digital Marketing communications* programme and attach the supporting documents required.
